item.description:
As we say every month we are so grateful to all of those who came out in support for our March Friendly Takeover at the Bell in Hand. Though we don't always see every face, we continue to see new faces being added to the community of folks who believe in our mission.

Speaking of which I thought this month I'd restate our mission so those who may not have had the opportunity to meet us or reach us can know what these "Friendly Takeovers" are about:

Our goal is to create and encourage a more inclusive social space for young (and not-so-young) professionals in Boston while beginning a larger conversation about dynamics of race relations among the city’s young people. We aim for this to have a ripple effect that impacts not only "professionals" but everyone in every community here in Boston.

Where you come in-- It's simple and two-fold: show up and spread the word. Have a drink with us, talk to some real people like you, and be visible.

As always: Please continue to invite friends, colleagues, family and anyone else interested in making Boston a more socially representative city. We continue to move forward knowing that there is a need to be filled. See you on the 26th!

 

 

For more information OR to make suggestions about how you might like us to move forward, please email us at visibleinboston@gmail.com. If you'd like to get on the mailing list send subject "Add to Mailing List".

Follow us on Twitter @visibleinboston
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be on the main floor around the bar where there are a few tables
item.name: Friendly Takeover w/ Visible In Boston - Apr 2013
